All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessToken
Gets the access token required to authenticate the requests to the Firebase messaging service
AdminEventDetailsActivity
Class that's purpose is to open a view that show the information of an event and the ability to delete the event and delete the QR code related to the event
AdminEventsFragment
AdminEventsFragment This class creates a view where the user can see the list of events, it can use the search bar to check for specific events and by clicking one event be able to see it details by open a new activity
AdminFacilitiesFragment
This class create a view where the user can see the list of facilities, it can use the search bar to check for specific facilities and by clicking one event be able to see it details by open a new fragment
AdminFacilityDetailsFragment
class that generates a fragment that shows the details or information of a FacilityModel object and also the ability of delete that facility
AdminGenericFragment<T>
Generic fragment to create a fragment with a search bar and listview to view elements of the desired type, it is a superclass that make that it subclass can personalize the type of elements to display on the list and then use their features
AdminImagesFragment
fragment that is in charge of the image view
AdminMainActivity
Class that creates a bottom Navigation View, that makes the user able to navigate between fragments
AdminTests
This class is the AdminTests This class is used to test the admin functionality This class auto grants the permissions to use app
AdminUserDetailsFragment
Fragment that shows the information of an UserModel object
AdminUsersFragment
This class create a view where the user can see the list of entrants, it can use the search bar to check for specific Entrants and by clicking one event be able to see it details by open a new fragment
CancelledListActivity
Cancelled List Activity This activity displays a list of users who have been cancelled by the organizer of the event.
CancelledListArrayAdapter
This class is the array adapter for the cancelled list It manages the entrants that are in the array to be displayed in the list in a specific way
ChosenEntrantsAdapter
This class is the ChosenEntrantsAdapter It manages the entrants that are in the array to be displayed in the list in a specific way
ChosenEntrantsAdapter.ChosenEntrantsAdapterCallback
An interface for the implementation of the remove button
ChosenListActivity
This class purpose is to show the entrants that are Chosen to sign up for the event they want to join, it display the chosen entrants in a listview where the organizer can send a notification to this entrants so they have the opportunity to enroll for the specific event
ChosenListBackButtonDialogueFragment
class that represent the button to go back to the past fragment or view
CreateEventDialogueFragment
This class creates a dialogue fragment where the organizer can input information to create an event, this information is then collected to the Firebase so it can be use in other places
EnrolledListActivity
Enrolled List Activity This class purpose is to show the entrants that are enroll to the event it display the enroll entrants in a listview where the organizer can send a notification so they know they are enrolled
EnrolledListArrayAdapter
Enrolled List Array Adapter It manages the entrants that are in the array to be displayed in the list in a specific way
EntrantEventsFragment
This class is the Waitlisting Fragment This class inflates fragment_waitlisted_events Not being used currently.
EventEntrantActivity
Event Entrant Activity This class generates a view where the user can join or unjoin a specific event, it also displays the details of the events, it location and date All images and poster stuff is left for part 4
EventEntrantTests
This is EventEntrantTests This class is used to test the event entrant functionality The permissions are auto granted
EventModel
Event Model This class represent an event where user can join/unjoin to the waitlist, and be selected by a lottery system so they can enroll in the event Also this class has all the information of the event, it include it deadlines, if geolocation is available or not It also contains the facility that the event belong
EventModelTest
This is the event model test class This class tests the event model class
EventOrganizerActivity
Event Organizer Activity The purpose of this class is to give the ability to the organizer to manage it event this class contain the information of the event, the Entrant that join the event and the differences list for each stage the entrant is in the event selection All the poster and images are for part 4
EventsArrayAdapter
Events Array Adapter This class is an adapter that manage the listview of events to configure the view of the elements on the listview in a specific way
EventTests
This is EventTests This class is used to test the event functionality Permissions are auto granted
EventWaitlistActivity
Event Waitlist Activity This class create the view where the organizer can see the people on the waitlist and manage them it also in this class the user can draw some user that will be chosen, so they can enroll to the event if the geolocation is on, this class shows the location in a map of the moment where the user join the event wait list
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FacilityArrayAdapter
Adapter of a array of FacilityModel objects This class is an adapter the manage an array of FacilityModel objects to be show in a specific way in a listview
FacilityDetailsDialogueFragment
Facility Details Dialogue Fragment This class is in charge of generationg a dialog where the user can put information to create a facility, and the firebase save the information of this facility and also who the owner of the facility
FacilityFragment
This class is the facility fragment This class inflates fragment_facility This class represent the management of the facility, so the organizer can manage the they facility This class purposes is to check if a faciliy doesn't exist if the facility doesn't exist, the class will generate a button to open a dialoge to create a facility If a facility exist the class will show the list of events the facility has and the ability to edit the facility or create new events
FacilityModel
Facility Model This class represent a Facility where events can be created by the organizer, this Facility has details about the facility, an owner (userID), the purpose of this class is to have a representation of a place where the event can take place
FacilityModelTest
This is the facility model test class This class tests the facility model class
FacilityTests
This is the facility test class
FcmNotificationSender
This is not being used
geo_requirement_dialog
This class create a dialog to tell the user that the specific event require geolocation then the user has the option to accept or reject the geolocation, if they accept the user is added to the event, if the user decline then nothing happened
InvitedListActivity
This class is the InvitedListActivity This activity displays a list of users who have been invited by the organizer of the event.
InvitedListArrayAdapter
Invited List Array Adapter It manages the entrants that are in the array to be displayed in the list in a specific way
LotterySystem
This class is the LotterySystem This class represent a lottery where some people are select so the organizer can invited them to enroll in the event, the draw is random and choose and specif number of entrants, the specific number is chose by the organizer
LotterySystemTest
This is the lottery system test class This class tests the lottery system class
MainActivity
This is the MainActivity class This class currently handles checking the user in the database, if the user exists then updating the current instance of the user
MyBroadcastReceiver
This is the MyBroadcastReceiver class This class handles the actions from notifications
NotificationFragmentAdapter
This is the NotificationFragmentAdapter class
NotificationsFragment
This class is the Notification fragment This class inflates fragment_notifications
NumberPickerDialogFragment
A number picker popup dialog fragment.
NumberPickerDialogFragment.NumberPickerDialogFragmentListener
The interface for retrieving the number selected in the dialog
ProfileFragment
This class is the profile fragment, it generates the fragment view where the user can interact This class is called when the user clicks the profile button on the bottom.
ProfileTests
This is the profiles test This tests the profile page of the app Permissions are auto granted to the app
PushNotificationService
This class is the PushNotificationService This class is used to receive notifications from the Firebase This overrides the onMessageReceived method to receive notifications from the Firebase
qr_code_dialog
This class is the QR code dialog.
RemoteUserRef
This class is the RemoteUserRef The purpose of this class is to make a small version of the UserModel, so the essential information of the User can be send to the Firebase, so the organizer can have the important information of the entrants, also it save the geolocation of the user to store in the firebase when the user join an event that required
RemoteUserRef.UserObserver
This is the interface for the observer This interface is used to check if the information has been changed in the firebase
ScanFragment
This class is the Scan Fragment This is the "home" page for the app This class inflates fragment_scan The purposes of this fragment is to scan QR codes of events in the app, that send the user to the event page so the usar can join/unjoin the event
SendNotification
This class is the SendNotification This sends an android notification to the user
SendNotificationDialog
This class is the SendNotificationDialog This was taken after Maxim implemented SendNotificationActivity
SubscribeToTopic
This class Subscribes the user to a topic This is required for sending notifications
UnsubscribeFromTopic
This class is the UnsubscribeFromTopic This unsubscribes the user from a topic
UserArrayAdapter
Adapter of a array of UserModel objects This class is an adapter the manage an array of UserModel objects to be show in a specific way in a listview
UserModel
This Class stores the current user's information This class represent a User on the app, it contains all the information of the user, it name, phone, email, profile picture and if the user has a facility where they can make events, it also check if the user has notification on/off This class provides setter and getter for the attributes of this class
UserModelTest
This is the user model test class This class tests the user model class
Waiter
This is the waiter class This class waits for an element to become visible or for a set amount of time.
Waiter.ViewInteractionCallback
This is the ViewInteractionCallback interface This interface is used to call a method on a ViewInteraction object
WaitlistEventAdapter
This class is the WaitlistEventAdapter
